p: In Section 4, it has been mentioned that the two approaches adopted in this paper to extract displacement information were the analysis of the elementary crystalline cell and a field approach. This section is devoted to the development of the second approach. Figure 10 is obtained from Figure 6a, filtering selected orders at the corner of the hexagon and computing the inverse FFT. A system of three fringe patterns at 120Â° of each other is obtained and in Figure 10 the wrapped phase patterns are plotted.
